articles.author: Lucia Mutikani
articles.title: U.S. employment likely accelerated in June as companies boost perks - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. job growth likely picked up in June as companies, desperate to boost production and services amid booming demand, raised wages and offered incentives to lure millions of reluctant unemployed Americans back into the labor force.
articles.content: An In-N-Out Burger advertises for workers at their restaurants location in Encinitas, California, U.S., May 10, 2021. REUTERS/Mike Blake/File PhotoWASHINGTON, July 2 (Reuters) - U.S. job growth likel… [+5636 chars]
